Items.Title: Reports of the Committee on Rules, Privileges, and Elections

Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the appointment by the Mayor of BENJAMIN KAIMON CHU, M.D. as a member of the New York City Board of Health.

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which was referred to on August 15, 2002, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to sections 31 and 553 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of BENJAMIN KAIMON CHU, M.D. as a member of the New York City Board of Health to serve for the remainder of a four-year term that commenced on June 1, 2002 and will expire on May 31, 2006.

Res. No. 489

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF BRUCE BENJAMIN KAIMON CHU, M.D. AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY BOARD OF HEALTH.

By Council Member Comrie

RESOLVED, that pursuant to sections 31 and 553 of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the appointment by the Mayor of BENJAMIN KAIMON CHU, M.D. as a member of the New York City Board of Health for the remainder of a four-year term that commenced on June 1, 2002 and will expire on May 31, 2006.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: M 292 - Benjamin K. Chu, M.D., M.P.H., F.A.C.P, Board of Health

Items.Title:
Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the appointment by the Mayor of GLENN LLYOD NEWMAN as President of the New York City Tax Commission

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which was referred to on August 15, 2002, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to sections 31 and 153 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of Glenn Lloyd Newman, as President of the New York City Tax Commission to serve for the remainder a six-year term expiring on January 6, 2008.


Res. No. 490

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF GLENN LLYOD NEWMAN AS PRESIDENT OF THE NEW YORK CITY TAX COMMISSION.

By Council Member Comrie

RESOLVED, that pursuant to sections 31 and 153 of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the appointment by the Mayor of Glenn Lloyd Newman as President of the New York City Tax Commission to serve for the remainder of a six-year term expiring on January 6, 2008.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: M 293 - Glen Newman,  President of the NYC Tax Commission

Rules, Privileges, and Elections

Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the appointment by the Mayor of BENJAMIN KAIMON CHU, M.D. as a member of the New York City Board of Health.

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which was referred to on August 15, 2002, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to sections 31 and 553 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of BENJAMIN KAIMON CHU, M.D. as a member of the New York City Board of Health to serve for the remainder of a four-year term that commenced on June 1, 2002 and will expire on May 31, 2006.

Res. No. 489

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF BRUCE BENJAMIN KAIMON CHU, M.D. AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY BOARD OF HEALTH.

By Council Member Comrie

RESOLVED, that pursuant to sections 31 and 553 of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the appointment by the Mayor of BENJAMIN KAIMON CHU, M.D. as a member of the New York City Board of Health for the remainder of a four-year term that commenced on June 1, 2002 and will expire on May 31, 2006.
Items.MatterName: M 292 - Benjamin K. Chu, M.D., M.P.H., F.A.C.P, Board of Health

Items.Title:
Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the appointment by the Mayor of GLENN LLYOD NEWMAN as President of the New York City Tax Commission

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections which was referred to on August 15, 2002, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to sections 31 and 153 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of Glenn Lloyd Newman, as President of the New York City Tax Commission to serve for the remainder a six-year term expiring on January 6, 2008.


Res. No. 490

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF GLENN LLYOD NEWMAN AS PRESIDENT OF THE NEW YORK CITY TAX COMMISSION.

By Council Member Comrie

RESOLVED, that pursuant to sections 31 and 153 of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the appointment by the Mayor of Glenn Lloyd Newman as President of the New York City Tax Commission to serve for the remainder of a six-year term expiring on January 6, 2008.
Items.MatterName: M 293 - Glen Newman,  President of the NYC Tax Commission
